original_text: And the Father who sent me has himself borne witness about me. His voice you have never heard, his form you have never seen,
korean_text: 또한 나를 보내신 아버지께서 친히 나를 위하여 증언하셨느니라 너희는 아무 때에도 그 음성을 듣지 못하였고 그 형상을 보지 못하였으며

sentences.original_text: And the Father who sent me has himself borne witness about me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 보내신 아버지께서 친히 나에 대해 증거하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: His voice you have never heard,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그의 음성을 들은 적이 없고,

sentences.original_text: his form you have never seen,
